title: Best Bits of the Week Show with Morgan2 - What You Didn't Hear About The Employee of the Month (Week of 11/2)
itunes:title: Best Bits of the Week Show with Morgan2 - What You Didn't Hear About The Employee of the Month (Week of 11/2)
description:
This podcast features behind the scenes from show members and moments that happened after we turned off the microphones. Morgan2 brings in Lunchbox and Scuba Steve to talk about what you didn't hear from this week's Employee of the Month Award competition. She also talks to Hillary about the Luke Comb's Crocs drama.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
